Name: The Wrath Of The Erlik
About the game: Raise your weapon and deal critical damage across a gorgeous open world in the newest cross-platform RPG! Enjoy the Action RPG with 2 attractive & unique characters Experience overwhelming power by combining various skills in your own style Become the ultimate warrior by collecting more than 20 types of armor and Soul stones to defeat legendary monsters [Game Features] ▶ 360 Degree Free Perspectives◀ - See the world from a 360 degree perspective, enjoy the splendid scenes in game. Tap to switch the perspectives as you like. ▶ Vast Open World! ◀ Explore rich environments such as snowfields, deserts, forests, and more!
